autoAppliedRules.name: Repository Information Overview
autoAppliedRules.content:
# Defense Solutions Web Application Information

## Summary
A modern web application for defense solutions built with React, Express, and TypeScript. The application features a client-side React frontend and a server-side Express backend, with Supabase integration for database operations.

## Structure
- `/client` - React frontend application with components, pages, and assets
- `/server` - Express backend server with API routes and database integration
- `/shared` - Shared types and database schemas using Drizzle ORM
- `/api` - API route handlers for serverless deployment

## Language & Runtime
**Language**: TypeScript/JavaScript
**Version**: TypeScript 5.6.3
**Build System**: Vite 5.4.19
**Package Manager**: pnpm (inferred from build commands)

## Dependencies
**Main Dependencies**:
- React 18.3.1 - Frontend UI library
- Express 4.21.2 - Backend server framework
- Supabase - Backend as a service for database operations
- Drizzle ORM - Database ORM with PostgreSQL support
- TailwindCSS - Utility-first CSS framework
- Wouter - Routing library for React
- Tanstack Query - Data fetching library
- Zod - Schema validation library

**Development Dependencies**:
- Vite - Build tool and development server
- TypeScript - Static type checking
- ESBuild - JavaScript bundler
- Drizzle Kit - Database migration tools

## Build & Installation
```bash
# Install dependencies
pnpm install

# Development mode
pnpm dev

# Production build
pnpm build

# Start production server
pnpm start

# Database schema push
pnpm db:push
```

## Database
**Type**: PostgreSQL (via Supabase)
**ORM**: Drizzle ORM
**Schema**: Defined in `shared/schema.ts`
**Tables**:
- users - User authentication
- contact_submissions - Contact form submissions

## Deployment
**Platform**: Vercel (configured via vercel.json)
**Build Command**: `pnpm build`
**Output Directory**: `dist/public`
**Environment Variables**:
- PORT - Server port (default: 3000)
- DATABASE_URL - PostgreSQL connection string
- SUPABASE_URL - Supabase project URL
- SUPABASE_ANON_KEY - Supabase anonymous key

## Client Application
**Framework**: React with TypeScript
**Routing**: Wouter
**State Management**: React Query
**UI Components**: Custom components with Radix UI primitives
**Styling**: TailwindCSS with SCSS
**Entry Point**: `client/src/main.tsx`

## Server Application
**Framework**: Express
**API Routes**: RESTful endpoints in `/api` directory
**Database Access**: Supabase client
**Entry Point**: `server/index.ts`
**Static Serving**: Production build serves static files from `dist/public`

## Testing
**Target Framework**: Playwright

content.text: I'll help you redesign the hero page to use the carousel images as a background, creating a more immersive and unique design. Let me first check the current structure and then implement the changes.
Now I'll redesign the hero section to use the carousel images as a full-screen background with smooth transitions. This will create a more immersive and modern design:

Perfect! I've completely redesigned the hero section with the following improvements:

## Key Changes:

### 1. **Full-Screen Background Images**
- The carousel images now serve as full-screen backgrounds
- Smooth fade and scale transitions between slides
- Enhanced with gradient overlays for better text readability
- Brightness and contrast filters for optimal visual hierarchy

### 2. **Immersive Layout**
- Full viewport height (`min-h-screen`) for maximum impact
- Content is centered and overlaid on the background
- Removed the side-by-side layout for a more modern, focused design

### 3. **Enhanced Visual Effects**
- Smooth AnimatePresence transitions between background images
- Scale animation (zoom effect) on slide changes
- Multiple gradient overlays for depth
- Glowing text effects on the teal accent color
- Hover effects on stats cards and buttons

### 4. **Improved Navigation**
- Elegant slide indicators at the bottom right
- Previous/Next arrow buttons with glassmorphism effect
- Auto-advance every 7 seconds
- Manual control available

### 5. **Better Content Presentation**
- Larger, more impactful typography
- Dynamic slide information that changes with each background
- Enhanced stats cards with hover effects
- Improved button styling with scale animations
- Added scroll indicator for better UX

### 6. **Modern Design Elements**
- Glassmorphism effects (backdrop blur)
- Smooth transitions throughout
- Better spacing and hierarchy
- Responsive design maintained
- Accessibility features preserved

The images are now crystal clear as backgrounds, creating a much more immersive and professional experience. The design is unique with the combination of full-screen backgrounds, glassmorphism effects, and smooth animations that make the hero section stand out.

href=%22/Solutions%22%3E%0A                %3CButton className=%22bg-teal hover:bg-teal/90 text-white font-bold py-5 px-10 rounded-xl shadow-2xl hover:shadow-teal/40 transition-all duration-300 inline-flex items-center justify-center text-lg sm:text-xl focus-ring hover:scale-105%22%3E%0A                  Explore Mission Platforms %3CFaArrowRight className=%22ml-3%22 /%3E%0A hover:scale-105%22%3E%0A                  Request a Defense Assessment%0A                %3C/Button%3E%0A              %3C/Link%3E%0A            %3C/motion.div%3E%0A%0A            %7B/* Slide Info mode=%22wait%22%3E%0A                %3Cmotion.div%0A                  key=%7BcurrentSlide%7D%0A                  initial=%7B%7B opacity: 0, y: 10 %7D%7D%0A                  animate=%7B%7B opacity: 1, y: 0 %7D%7D%0A                  exit=%7B%7B opacity: 0, y: -10 %7D%7D%0A                  transition=%7B%7B duration: 0.5 %7D%7D%0A                  className=%22space-y-2%22%0A                %3E%0A                  %3Ch3 className=%22text-2xl font-bold text-teal%22%3E%7BheroSlides%5BcurrentSlide%5D.title%7D%3C/h3%3E%0A                  %3Cp className=%22text-white/80 text-lg%22%3E%7BheroSlides%5BcurrentSlide%5D.subtitle%7D%3C/p%3E%0A                %3C/motion.div%3E%0A              %3C/AnimatePresence%3E%0A            %3C/motion.div%3E%0A          %3C/motion.div%3E%0A        %3C/div%3E%0A      %3C/div%3E%0A%0A      %7B/* Navigation Controls */%7D%0A      %3Cdiv className=%22absolute bottom-8 right-8 z-20 flex items-center gap-4%22%3E%0A        %7B/* Slide Indicators */%7D%0A        %3Cdiv className=%22flex gap-2%22%3E%0A          %7BheroSlides.map((_, index) =%3E (%0A            %3Cbutton%0A              key=%7Bindex%7D%0A              onClick=%7B() =%3E setCurrentSlide(index)%7D%0A              className=%7B%60h-2 rounded-full transition-all duration-300 focus-ring $%7B%0A                index === currentSlide %0A                  ? 'bg-teal w-12' %0A                  : 'bg-white/40 hover:bg-white/60 w-2'%0A              %7D%60%7D%0A              aria-label=%7B%60Go to slide $%7Bindex + 1%7D%60%7D%0A              aria-current=%7Bindex === currentSlide%7D%0A            /%3E%0A          ))%7D%0A        %3C/div%3E%0A%0A        %7B/* Arrow Controls */%7D%0A        %3Cdiv className=%22flex gap-2%22%3E%0A          %3Cbutton%0A            onClick=%7BprevSlide%7D%0A            className=%22bg-white/10 hover:bg-white/20 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 text-white p-3 rounded-full transition-all duration-300 focus-ring hover:scale-110%22%0A            aria-label=%22Previous slide%22%0A          %3E%0A            %3CFaChevronLeft className=%22text-lg%22 /%3E%0A          %3C/button%3E%0A          %3Cbutton%0A            onClick=%7BnextSlide%7D%0A            className=%22bg-white/10 hover:bg-white/20 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/20 text-white p-3 rounded-full transition-all duration-300 focus-ring hover:scale-110%22%0A            aria-label=%22Next slide%22%0A          %3E%0A            %3CFaChevronRight className=%22text-lg%22 /%3E%0A          %3C/button%3E%0A        %3C/div%3E%0A      %3C/div%3E%0A%0A      %7B/* Scroll Indicator */%7D%0A      %3Cmotion.div%0A        initial=%7B%7B opacity: 0 %7D%7D%0A        animate=%7B%7B opacity: 1 %7D%7D%0A        transition=%7B%7B delay: 1.5 %7D%7D%0A        className=%22absolute bottom-8 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 z-20 hidden lg:block%22%0A      %3E%0A        %3Cdiv className=%22flex flex-col items-center gap-2 text-white/60%22%3E%0A          %3Cspan className=%22text-xs uppercase tracking-wider font-medium%22%3EScroll to Explore%3C/span%3E%0A          %3Cmotion.div%0A            animate=%7B%7B y: %5B0, 8, 0%5D %7D%7D%0A            transition=%7B%7B duration: 1.5, repeat: Infinity, ease: 'easeInOut' %7D%7D%0A            className=%22w-6 h-10 border-2 border-white/40 rounded-full flex items-start justify-center p-2%22%0A          %3E%0A            %3Cdiv className=%22w-1 h-2 bg-white/60 rounded-full%22 /%3E
 %0A

+motion.
